LightningComponentBundle.description: Custom flow navigation buttons to support redirections and embedding of buttons on screen

property.name: buttonLabel
property.label: Label
property.description: Label to be displayed on the button

property.name: flowAction
property.label: FLOW Action
property.description: On click where do we go in the flow NEXT or PREVIOUS or FINISH

property.name: position
property.label: Button position
property.description: Float the button on the LEFT or on the RIGHT leave blank for anywhere

property.name: buttonPressed
property.label: Confirmation Button Pressed
property.description: Confirms that the button has been pressed

property.name: stetchButton
property.label: Stretch button to fill available space
property.description: Forces the button to fill the entire space available
